name: Art's Greatest Demo
description:
This is my first game. I don't want to spoil anything to you, wouldn't I? After all, it wouldn't be any fun, would it? 

Credits:

Giuseppe de Nitti's Winter Landscape, uploaded by TradeBit

The other snowy landscape is not owned by me. I forgot who the original artist was...

Baroque Coffee House, royalty free by Youtube

Antarctica, by some other website, or Youtube

November, by Ben Sound (most likely)

Misconseption, by myuu (on Youtube, it's myuuji)
